# stacklet_msteams_integration_surface (Data Source)

Retrieve Microsoft Teams integration configuration details.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Fetch Microsoft Teams integration configuration details
data "stacklet_msteams_integration_surface" "example" {}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `bot_endpoint` (String) The bot endpoint URL for the MS Teams integration.
- `oidc_client` (String) The OIDC client identifier for the MS Teams integration.
- `oidc_issuer` (String) The OIDC issuer URL for the MS Teams integration.
